record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 09, 2007)

[Page: H11369]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, because I was detained by an important event in my district, I was unable to vote on H. Res. 32, regarding human rights and gender-based persecutions, and H.R. 400, the "War Profiteering Prevention Act." Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on both bills.
